channel.title: FLF - The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Education, Luther, Slums, and the Metaverse [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
The connection between all these themes becomes clear in this special guest episode with Dr. Vishal Mangalwadi. He explains the Third Education Revolution movement, the role of technology, and the historic impact that the gospel has had, through education, on the family, church, and all other spheres.

Vishal is currently on a lecture tour of southern Ontario. Find a session in your area.

Get Joe Boot’s latest booklet, For Reformational Thinking, at Ezra Press.
item.author: Ryan Eras, Vishal Mangalwadi
item.itunes:author: Ryan Eras, Vishal Mangalwadi
